revision.comment: Alter: pages, title, url. URLs might have been anonymized. Add: s2cid. Removed parameters. Formatted [[WP:ENDASH|dashes]]. Some additions/deletions were parameter name changes. | [[WP:UCB|Use this bot]]. [[WP:DBUG|Report bugs]]. | Suggested by AManWithNoPlan | #UCB_CommandLine 170/2973

{{About|an administrative division of [[Captaincy General of Yucatán|colonial Yucatan]]|the modern administrative division|Bacalar Municipality|the city|Bacalar}} {{short description|Administrative division of colonial Yucatan from 1544 to 1821}} {{use dmy dates|date=August 2021}} {{Use British English|date=August 2021}} {{Infobox former subdivision |_noautocat = |native_name = {{native name|es|El municipio de la villa de Salamanca de Bacalar|parensize=85%}} |conventional_long_name = District of Salamanca de Bacalar |common_name = Bacalar |subdivision = Colony |nation = Spain |demonym = {{hlist|salmantino|salamanquino|bacalareño}} |status_text = Municipality of [[Captaincy General of Yucatan|colonial Yucatan]] |title_leader = [[List of viceroys of New Spain|Viceroy]] |title_deputy = [[Governor of Yucatán|Governor]] |leader1 = [[Antonio de Mendoza]] (''first'') |leader2 = [[Juan O'Donojú]] (''last'') |year_leader1 = 1535-1550 |year_leader2 = 1821-1821 |deputy1 = [[Francisco de Montejo]] (''first'') |year_deputy1 = 1527–1540 |deputy2 = [[Juan María Echeverri]] (''last'') |year_deputy2 = 1821-1821 |legislature = [[Real Audiencia of Mexico]] |house1 = |house2 = |type_house1 = |type_house2 = |capital = [[Bacalar|Salamanca de Bacalar]] |coordinates = {{coord|20|58|N|89|37|W|region:MX_type:city}} |motto = {{native name|la|[[Plus ultra]]|paren=no}} {{small|(''Further beyond'')}} |anthem = {{native name|es|[[Marcha Real]]|paren=no}} {{small|(''Royal March'')}}
{{center|[[File:Himno Nacional de España.ogg]]}}
|political_subdiv = |today = {{hlist|[[Belize]]|[[Guatemala]]|[[Mexico]]}} |year_start = 1544 |year_end = 1821 |event_start = Founding of Salamanca |date_start = 4 March |event_end = Yucatecan independence |date_end = 27 September |event1 = Tipu revolt & English settlement |date_event1 = ''s.d.'' 1638 |event2 = Retreat of Salamanca |date_event2 = ''s.d.'' 1652 |event3 = ''Reducciones'' |date_event3 = ''s.d.'' 1695 |event4 = Return of Salamanca |date_event4 = ''s.d.'' 1729 |event5 = |date_event5 = |life_span = |era = [[Spanish conquest of Yucatan|Spanish conquest]] to [[Mexican War of Independence|Yucatecan independence]] |event_pre = |date_pre = |event_post = |date_post = |image_flag = Flag of Cross of Burgundy.svg |image_border = |flag_type = |flag = Cross of Burgundy |image_coat = Escudo de Merida Yucatan.svg |symbol_type = |symbol = |image_map = Yucatan-Peninsula-1822 Map.jpg |image_map_caption =
Map of Spanish Yucatan showing Salamanca de Bacalar.
|p1 = Chetumal Province |flag_p1 = |border_p1 = |image_p1 = |p2 = Dzuluinicob |flag_p2 = |border_p2 = |image_p2 = |p3 = Uaymil |flag_p3 = |border_p3 = |image_p3 = |s1 = British Honduras |flag_s1 = English Red Ensign 1620.svg |border_s1 = |image_s1 = |s2 = First Mexican Empire |flag_s2 = First flag of the Mexican Empire.svg |stat_year1 = 1544 |stat_area1 = 1000 |stat_pop1 = 500 |stat_year2 = 1638 |stat_area2 = 1000 |stat_pop2 = 500 | area_lost1 = south | lost_to1 = {{hlist|Tipu|Belize}} | area_lost_year1 = 1638 | area_gained1 = | gained_from1 = | area_gained_year1 = |government_type = [[Absolute monarchy]] with [[theocracy|theocratic]] and [[oligarchy|oligarchic]] features | Status = | Government = | Arms = | arms_caption = | Civic = | civic_caption = | HQ = | CodeName = | Code = | Divisions = Settlement | DivisionsNames = {{hlist|xxx|xxx}} | DivisionsMap = | divisions_map_caption = | membership_title1 = | membership1 = | membership_title2 = | membership2 = | membership_title3 = | membership3 = | membership_title4 = | membership4 = | membership_title5 = | membership5 = |footnotes = }} The '''district of Salamanca de Bacalar''' was one of four districts or ''municipios'' in [[Captaincy General of Yucatan|colonial Yucatan]] from 1544 to 1821. == Geography == [[File:Detail of nvvos orbvs 20 May 1570 Theatrum Orbis Terrarum.png|thumb|upright=1.5|Yucatan peninsula and the Bay of Honduras in the mid-16th century (1570 by A. Ortelius via Ruderman)]] [[File:Amérique septentrionale par N (...)Sanson Nicolas btv1b8469958t 1.jpg|thumb|upright=2|alt=Map showing Spanish settlements in the Yucatan peninsula and northern Central America (1650 by Nicolas Sanson d'Abbeville)|Yucatan peninsula and the Bay of Honduras in the early 17th century (1650 by N. Sanson d'Abbeville via BnF)]] [[File:Service-gmd-gmd4-g4410-g4410-ma001001.jpg|thumb|upright=2|alt=Map showing Spanish settlements in the Yucatan peninsula and northern Central America (1656 by Nicolas Sanson d'Abbeville)|Yucatan peninsula and the Bay of Honduras in the early 17th century (1656 by N. Sanson d'Abbeville via LC)]] [[File:Carte du Mexique et de la Floride des Terres Angloises et des Isles Antilles du Cours et des Environs de la Riviere de Mississipi.jpg|thumb|upright=2|alt=Map showing Spanish settlements in the Yucatan peninsula and northern Central America (1703 by G. de L'Isle via Huntington)|Yucatan peninsula and the Bay of Honduras in the early 18th century (1703 by G. de L'Isle via Huntington)]] [[File:Service-gmd-gmd3-g3300-g3300-ct007369.jpg|thumb|upright=2|alt=Map showing Spanish settlements in the Yucatan peninsula and northern Central America (circa 1740 by M. Seutter & T. C. Lotter via LC)|Yucatan peninsula and the Bay of Honduras in the early 18th century ({{circa|1740}} by M. Seutter & T. C. Lotter via LC)]] === Physical === === Political === == History == === Prelude === Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.{{sfn|Adams|Macleod|1998|p=1 }}test == Notes == {{reflist|group=note }} == Citations == {{reflist }} == References == {{refbegin }} === Serials === === Theses === # {{cite thesis |last1=Bolland |first1=Orlando N. |date=June 1975 |title=The Formation of a Colonial Society : Belize, from conquest to Crown colony |publisher=University of Hull |place=Hull, Eng. |type=PhD |oclc=500387462 }} # {{cite thesis |last1=Breuer |first1=Kimberly H. |date=1993 |title=Colonies of Happenstance : The English settlements in Central America, 1525–1787 |publisher=University of Texas |place=Arlington, TX |type=MA |oclc=35313362 }} # {{cite thesis |last1=Breuer |first1=Kimberly H. |date=2004 |title=Reshaping the cosmos: Maya society on the Yucatecan frontier |publisher=Vanderbilt University |place=Nashville, TN |type=PhD |url=https://www.proquest.com/docview/305104367 |url-access=subscription }} # {{cite thesis |last1=Caso Barrera |first1=Laura |date=2000 |title=Caminos en la selva: Relaciones entre Yucatán y el Petén siglos XVII-XIX |type=PhD |publisher=El Colegio de México |place=Mexico City |url=https://www.proquest.com/docview/2592957686 |url-access=subscription }} # {{cite thesis |last1=Chuchiak IV |first1=John F. |date=2000 |title=The Indian Inquisition and the extirpation of idolatry: The process of punishment in the provisorato de indios of the Diocese of Yucatan, 1563–1812 |publisher=Tulane University |place=New Orleans, LA |type=PhD |url=https://www.proquest.com/docview/304628157 |url-access=subscription }} # {{cite thesis |last1=Conover Blancas |first1=Carlos |date=2013 |title=Llave y custodia de esta provincia : el presidio de San Felipe Bacalar ante los asentamientos británicos del sur - oriente de la Península de Yucatán (1779 - 1798) |type=MA |publisher=Universidad Nacional Autónoma de México |place=Mexico City |url=http://132.248.9.41:8880/jspui/handle/DGB_UNAM/TES01000696603 }} # {{cite thesis |last1=Finamore |first1=Daniel R. |date=1994 |type=PhD |title=Sailors and Slaves on the Wood-Cutting Frontier : Archaeology of the British bay settlement, Belize |publisher=Boston University |place=Boston, MA |oclc=35313422 }} # {{cite thesis |last1=Galvin |first1=Peter R. |date=December 1991 |title=The Pirates' Wake : A geography of piracy and pirates as geographers in colonial Spanish America, 1536–1718 |type=PhD |publisher=Louisiana State University |place=Baton Rouge, LA |url=https://digitalcommons.lsu.edu/gradschool_disstheses/5233 }} # {{cite thesis |last1=Garcia |first1=Octavio |date=2015 |title=African slavery and the impact of the Haitian revolution in Bourbon New Spain: Empire-building in the Atlantic age of revolution, 1750-1808 |type=PhD |publisher=University of Arizona |place=Tucson, AZ |url=https://www.proquest.com/docview/1698102241 |url-access=subscription }} # {{cite thesis |last1=González Cicero |first1=Stella María |date=1976 |title=Yucatan, los Franciscanos y el primer obispo fray Francisco de Toral (1517 - 1571) |type=PhD |publisher=El Colegio de México |place=Mexico City |url=https://www.proquest.com/docview/2627562843 |url-access=subscription }} # {{cite thesis |last1=Hunt |first1=Sophia Betsworth |date=2017 |title=Grasping the Gulf: Conquest and Indigenous Power from Florida to Yucatán in the Age of Revolutions |type=PhD |publisher=University of Michigan |place=Ann Arbor, MI |url=https://www.proquest.com/docview/1989792074 |url-access=subscription }} # {{cite thesis |last1=McJunkin |first1=David M. |date=1991 |type=PhD |title=Logwood : An inquiry into the historical biogeography of Haematoxylum campeachianum L. and related dyewoods of the neotropics |publisher=University of California |place=Los Angeles, CA |oclc= 24057056 }} # {{cite thesis | type = PhD | last = Meissner | first = Nathan J. | date = 2014 | title = Technological systems of small point weaponry of the Postclassic Lowland Maya (a.d. 1400 -
